document.full_text: lebron james powered miami to a 98-90 win over the atlanta hawks on monday as the heat clinched the no.2 seeding in the nba's eastern conference.
document.title: lebron slices up hawks as heat clinch east's second seeding
lines_and_colors: lebron james powered miami to a 98-90 win over the atlanta hawks on monday as the heat clinched the no.2 seeding in the nba's eastern conference.
